title: [VMRDT110] Jaguar Paw - Yul Brynner / You Know I'm Lying [Viral-Mental Records Juno Download Exclusive Available Now!!!]
content: 1/ Yul Brynner. 2/ You Know I'm Lying. The infamous Jaguar Paw makes his triumphant return to the Viral-Mental Records fold with two massive tracks, with the release of the 'Yul Brynner / You Know I'm Lying' single. The dark and moody 'Yul Brynner' steps up to the plate first and grabs the listener by the throat with it's oppressive, opening drones which are blended into a hypnotic pulsating bassline and crisp, rolling breakbeat combo interspersed with cinematic vocal snippets and delayed dub FX.    To complete the package 'You Know I'm Lying' drops a skittish, half-step beat over a series of deep and twisted bass throbs, soothing synth notes and portentous movie dialogue to create a track which expertly combines the rough with the smooth to devastating effect.  If you love your jungle with a touch of the deep side, then Jaguar Paw more than delivers with his latest release here.  The Jaguar Paw 'Yul Brynner / You Know I'm Lying' single is available to purchase now exclusively from Juno Download before going on general release. Grab your copy now!!! https://www.junodownload.com/products/jaguar-paw-yul-brynner-you-know-im/3776111-02/ Follow Jaguar Paw on Facebook... https://www.facebook.com/JaguarPawLondon Follow Jaguar Paw on Soundcloud... https://soundcloud.com/jaguarpawlondon/ Follow Viral-Mental Records on Facebook... https://www.facebook.com/ViralMentalRecords/?fref=ts Follow Viral-Mental Records on Soundcloud... https://soundcloud.com/viralmentalrecords For all Viral-Mental Records releases, artists and information you can check out the official webpage here... http://www.viral-mentalrecords.com/home.html
contentWithMarkup:
1/ Yul Brynner.
2/ You Know I'm Lying.

The infamous Jaguar Paw makes his triumphant return to the Viral-Mental Records fold with two massive tracks, with the release of the 'Yul Brynner / You Know I'm Lying' single.

The dark and moody 'Yul Brynner' steps up to the plate first and grabs the listener by the throat with it's oppressive, opening drones which are blended into a hypnotic pulsating bassline and crisp, rolling breakbeat combo interspersed with cinematic vocal snippets and delayed dub FX.   

To complete the package 'You Know I'm Lying' drops a skittish, half-step beat over a series of deep and twisted bass throbs, soothing synth notes and portentous movie dialogue to create a track which expertly combines the rough with the smooth to devastating effect. 

If you love your jungle with a touch of the deep side, then Jaguar Paw more than delivers with his latest release here. 

The Jaguar Paw 'Yul Brynner / You Know I'm Lying' single is available to purchase now exclusively from Juno Download before going on general release. Grab your copy now!!!
